# Introduction

This package includes the functions `my_t_test`, `my_lm`, `my_knn_cv`, and `my_rf_cv`.
To install and load this package:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install firstpackage
devtools::install_github("hchang23/firstpackage")

# load firstpackage
library(firstpackage)
```
